dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 132 IH: Western Water Accelerated Revenue Repayment Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Boebert introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the Water Infrastructure Improvements for the Nation Act to extend certain contract prepayment authority.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Western Water Accelerated Revenue Repayment Act.

subsection.text: Section 4011(d)(2) of the Water Infrastructure Improvements for the Nation Act (Public Law 114–322) is amended by inserting that are directed by project-specific statutes in effect prior to the date of passage of this Act to accounts other than the General Reclamation Fund before the semicolon.
Section 4013 of the Water Infrastructure Improvements for the Nation Act (Public Law 114–322) is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (1), by striking ; and and inserting a semicolon;
in paragraph (2), by striking the period and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following:
